description:
This Bubble.io plugin allows users to generate random integers or floating-point numbers within specified minimum and maximum values, with customizable decimal places.

[b]Features[/b]
üî• Generate random integers within a specified range  
üî• Generate floating-point numbers with customizable decimal places  
üî• Set input minimum and maximum values  
üî• Easy integration with Bubble.io workflows

name: Random Number Generator
plugin_instructions:
[b]How to Use[/b]
1Ô∏è‚É£ Install the "Random Number Generator" plugin into your Bubble app from the plugins marketplace.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Add the "Random Number Generator" action to your desired workflow.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Configure the action's properties by setting the minimum and maximum values, selecting the number type (`Integer` or `Floating Point`), and specifying decimal places if needed.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Use the "randomnumber" state on your plugin  to retrieve the random number that was generated.

You can see how the plugin is being used here:

https://bubble.io/page?id=tinybuild-random-number&tab=tabs-1&name=index
